verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he may pardon another late heavyweight boxing champion — this time , Muhammad Ali] .
President Donald Trump says he [V: may] pardon another late heavyweight boxing champion — this time , Muhammad Ali .
President Donald Trump says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: pardon] [ARG1: another late heavyweight boxing champion — this time , Muhammad Ali] .
